functions.author: The Coven of Tomes
pages:
§2[Aura of Prosperity]§1

Tytus oversees and loves the flora of the worlds with His Body itself. §2Aura of Prosperity§1 pulls from this concept and wraps the caster in a cacoon of Primal Earth.
§1As a result, all plants in the vicinity will grow at an accelerated rate. As a result, it has become famous among those that love agriculture.
